thread.title: Clinton and the 'Deplorables': Her Comments About Trump Voters—Her Fellow Americans—Show Why She Could Lose
thread.title_full: Clinton and the 'Deplorables': Her Comments About Trump Voters—Her Fellow Americans—Show Why She Could Lose - Fox Nation

author: givemwat4
text:
When Hillary said this it reminded people of all the baseless insults they have endured from the Left over the past several years. Regular people who want borders and accountability in Washington and common-sense immigration, economic and environmental policies have been called racist, xenophobic, homophobic, ignorant, all sorts of names. People are sick and tired of it.
The Left's habit of using insults against people who disagree with them should and I think will come back to bite them.
